questions.question: What does this scheduling app do?
questions.answer: Our platform automates shift scheduling for ER staff members, ensuring fair, optimized, and conflict-free work schedules.

questions.question: Who can use this app?
questions.answer: ER staff members, hospital administrators, HR teams, and clinic managers.

questions.question: Does this work for private practices as well as hospitals?
questions.answer: Yes, our app is based upon the fact that we provide custom-tailored scheduling systems that can handle both small clinics and large hospital departments.

questions.question: How do I sign up?
questions.answer: On desktop computer, click the Sign Up button on the top right of your screen. On mobile, tap the menu button and press Sign Up.

questions.question: Can multiple users from the same clinic or hospital access the same schedule?
questions.answer: Currently, only the account that generates schedules for all teams can export and share generated schedules manually. We are considering adding collaborative access for multiple users in the future.

questions.question: How does the scheduling system work?
questions.answer: The system uses AI to analyze preferences, minimum and maximum work-hour constraints, and other settings to create optimal shift plans.

questions.question: Does this system generate schedules for multiple teams?
questions.answer: Yes, each team may have its own scheduling rules, each of which needs its own scheduling system. When you click on the Generate Schedule button on a chosen month and year, you can view each team's generated schedule separately.

questions.question: Can I set preferences for my shifts?
questions.answer: Yes, doctors can set preferences for night shifts, weekends, or specific availability. Holidays can be assigned to selected ER staff members, and the system will keep that in mind when generating a schedule.

questions.question: Can I get notifications about upcoming shifts?
questions.answer: Currently, the app does not support notifications. However, we are planning on implementing email notifications in the future. Push notifications and SMS reminders may also be available in future updates.

questions.question: Can I export the schedule?
questions.answer: Yes, schedules can be exported to Excel (with automatic schedule formatting), TSV, CSV, and JSON.

questions.question: Does the app ensure compliance with labor laws and ER shift regulations?
questions.answer: Currently, users can set the minimum and maximum work hours for each ER staff member registered. In the future, we are considering implementing various global and regional labor laws to suit your needs.

questions.question: How does the app prevent over-scheduling?
questions.answer: The system enforces fair distribution and flags potential burnout risks. All ER staff members are given equal (or approximately equal) number of work hours. You can view the total number of shifts and work hours for each ER staff member in the dashboard when selecting a schedule on a specific month.

questions.question: How does the app ensure fairness in scheduling?
questions.answer: The system considers workload balance, shift preferences, designated holidays, and legal work-hour limitations.

questions.question: Do you offer a free trial version?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer free trials when negotiating with clients via email.

questions.question: Are there different plans for small clinics vs. large hospitals?
questions.answer: Yes, we are available to design fully-personalized scheduling systems for clinics and hospitals of all sizes.

questions.question: What if my schedule doesn't look right?
questions.answer: To regenerate your schedule, check your dashboard settings (ER staff, shifts, holidays) and click 'Regenerate Schedule.' If issues persist, visit the Contact Us page to report a problem.

questions.question: How do I contact support?
questions.answer: Go to the Contact Us page, choose a category (e.g., Technical Issue, Feature Request), describe your issue, and submit your request.

questions.question: How do I report an issue or request a feature?
questions.answer: Visit the Contact Us page, select 'Feature Suggestion' or 'Report an Issue,' enter your message, and submit.
